about_the_game:
Planned Immersive Tarot Card Reading Experience - The Tarot comes to Life




Begin your Tarot journey by selecting your cards from a shuffled spread for a Tarot reading, meditate on how the chosen cards correspond to the Sefirot in the Tree of Life. Learn about spiritual practices of the Tarot and how they relate to the emanations of Tree of Life, Astrology, and other ancient and esoteric practices.

This is where the currently available "Early Access" version ends as we collect community feedback.

Please lend your support to creating the experience below, transforming a deck of cards into a fully immersive Role Playing experience:

Depending on the response from the community, we hope to add more content including options for different types of readings and immersive Tarot scenes you can explore and eventually enact as Role Play through the Tarot, transforming card readings for the querent (the player) into immersive astral experiences once they pass through the portal. As we progress with development, we hope to provide a sort of surreal "Alice through the looking glass" experience of the Tarot. Fun and possibly challenging experiences that stimulate thought patterns aligned with Tarot character archetypes.

We imagine, once the project is completed, you will sit at the table in the game for a tarot reading, drawing the cards you selected one by one. From the reading you may choose to channel the primary character of a selected card. As you pass through the corresponding portal, you will find yourself interacting with the world and other characters from your reading. For example, you may choose to play The Fool as you and your dog wander into an unknown castle to meet The Hierophant, and the Knight of Swords as you begin your astral journey.

Buy or Wishlist this game experience to be notified as each Tarot scene in development is released.

Early Access users will be able to help shape the Tarot experience with their feedback.

name: Tarot Realms
short_description: Select three cards from a shuffled deck to get a spread for Past, Present, and Future. See how the chosen cards correspond to the Tree of Life sefirot. Provide your feedback as we work on interactive Tarot characters and locations together. Join us in making a meditative immersive Tarot experience.
